about_the_game:
You return to Starvale after many years, drawn back by memories and a sense of unfinished business. As you reconnect with old friends and explore familiar places, you soon realize that something is deeply amiss. Strange lights dance across the night sky, shadowy figures lurk in the woods, and whispers on the wind carry cryptic messages.

Your childhood friend, Evelyn, is still here, a beacon of warmth and kindness. Yet, she seems haunted by the town’s enigmatic past. Luna, once a reserved artist, is now deeply entangled in the town's ancient rituals and secrets. Meanwhile, Aiden, a charismatic and adventurous blogger, is an aspiring journalist dedicated to uncovering Starvale’s hidden truths.

Together, you must unravel the mysteries of Starvale, confront your deepest fears, and discover the truth behind the supernatural occurrences.


  • Evelyn, your childhood friend, offers warmth and familiarity, but beneath her welcoming smile lies a past filled with unresolved emotions and hidden connections to the town’s dark secrets.
  • Luna, the reclusive artist, navigates her own path through the strange phenomena, seeking inspiration amidst chaos, all while guarding her true motives with an enigmatic calm.
  • Aiden, the tech-savvy journalist, sees an opportunity in the unfolding events—a chance to make his mark. But his knowledge of Starvale's mysteries may either aid your journey or hinder it, depending on your choices.


  • Rich, Branching Narrative: Experience a deeply immersive story with multiple paths and endings based on your choices.
  • Interactive Dialogue System: Engage with characters in meaningful conversations that affect relationships and story outcomes.
  • Supernatural Phenomena: Encounter mysterious lights, shadowy figures, and otherworldly events that challenge your perception of reality.
  • Puzzle Solving: Decipher cryptic messages and solve puzzles to unlock hidden secrets and progress the story.
  • Atmospheric Art and Sound: Enjoy beautifully hand-drawn expressive characters and an original soundtrack that brings Starvale to life.
  • Trophies: Unlock different achievements and amazing hand-drawn art graphics on the in-game gallery depending on the branch you take on the story.
  • Accessibility: Dyslexic font for the text; Visual SFX text and audio/music cues; Turn off shake screen and constant animated assets; Censor violent-graphic assets.

Staff

Production Team: Stellar Forge
Director/Programming: n3xPRODiGY
Character/Scene/CG Design: PokuriMio
Interface Design: n3xPRODiGY
Script: Secret Silver Lining
Music Design: Lourenço Lampreia

Whispering Memories is a narrative driven story, however it contains some moderate violence that some may find upsetting. There's a censored option that you can enable but player discretion is advised.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a psychological thriller where your choices shape the story. Unravel the mysteries of a town plagued by supernatural phenomena, as you navigate the environments and interact with complex characters. Can you uncover the truth before it consumes you?
